EmailTemplate.name: Final Package Returned
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Order #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We attempted to mail the Final Package for your Provisional Application for Patent order, however it was returned due to an insufficient address. The mailing address we have on file for your account is:
Name Address City, State, Zip
Please provide an updated shipping address as soon as possible so that we can resend your documents. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have experienced as a result of this delay.
It is very important to us to get your legal documents delivered to you in a timely manner. As a reassurance to our commitment, we've also attached a copy of the completed documents to this e-mail. This attachment includes the following:
1) LegalZoom cover letter 2) The E-filing receipt from the USPTO 3) A copy of your application 4) ADS (Application Data Sheet) 5) A non-disclosure agreement form
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom and we look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best Regards,
LegalZoom Patent Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
